question_text:
Question 57
Distillation of a non-reactive binary mixture with components 
𝐴
 and 
𝐵
 is carried out in a batch still as 
shown in the figure below. The initial charge of the mixture in the still is 1 kmol. The initial and final 
amounts of 
𝐴
 in the still are 0.1 kmol and 0.01 kmol, respectively. Use a constant relative volatility of 4.5. 
The mole fraction of 
𝐵
 remaining in the vessel is _______ (rounded off to three decimal places).
[Mass Transfer, 2 Marks]
Condenser
Product receiver
Batch still
answer_text:
0.982 
Sol. 
By solution of Rayleigh Equation
